2022-07-01 datlas · People –

Welcome to Joseph, PhD student

Datlas is now in a partnership with the MIO and LIS research institues and University of Toulon, France to host Joseph Jenkins's PhD (CIFRE grant) on surface ocean currents and the prediction of Lagrangian drift by deep learning. Read More ›
